SEARCH
Package util.DataStore

Class BaseDataStoreCSV

Object
BaseDataStoreCSV
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampDataStoreCSVImpl, FeedbackDataStoreCSVImpl, UserDataStoreCSVImpl
public abstract class BaseDataStoreCSV extends Object

This abstract class defines methods common to DataStoreCSVImpl. Specifically, it provides helpers to maintain a hasmap of CSVTables Database is loaded into memory on init, and saved on cleanup.

Since:
23-11-2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sim Yi Wan Terence

  • Field Details

    • tables

      protected Map<String,CSVTable> tables
      A map of table names to csv tables

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseDataStoreCSV

      public BaseDataStoreCSV()
      Initializes the tables hashmap.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initialises the csv tables. Creates the file if they dont exist, else reads in data. Override this if you need to init addtional things, but ensure to call super.init().

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Writes all data in memory back to csv files. Unlikely that you need to override, but if yes ensure to do super.cleanup().

    • dataExists

      protected boolean dataExists(String path)
      Checks if csv file exists at path.
      Parameters:
      path - filepath to csv file
      Returns:
      true if file exists
